boostPage.title: Boost
boostPage.subtitle: Get more visibility and attract new clients
boostPage.step1Desc: Pay {{price}} for {{days}} days of priority visibility in search results.
boostPage.step2Desc: When new clients find you via Boost and book their first session, you pay a {{percent}}% commission.
boostPage.step3Desc: All future bookings from that client are 100% yours. No more Boost fees for repeat clients.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.howMuchCostAnswer: Boost costs {{price}} for {{days}} days. This is a one-time payment with no auto-renewal. Additionally, when Boost brings you a NEW client, you pay {{percent}}% of their first session booking. Bookings under {{minFee}} are calculated at {{minFee}} (minimum fee: {{minCommission}}). Bookings over {{maxFee}} are capped at {{maxFee}} (maximum fee: {{maxCommission}}).
faq.whatHappensAfterAnswer: After {{days}} days, your Boost expires and you'll return to normal search ranking. There's no auto-renewal - you'll need to purchase Boost again if you want to continue appearing first in results.
faq.clientNoShow: What if a client doesn't show up?
faq.clientNoShowAnswer: If a client acquired via Boost doesn't show up for their first appointment, you can mark them as a no-show and the commission fee will be waived. We want you to only pay for real results.
faq.repeatBookings: Do I pay commission for repeat bookings?
faq.repeatBookingsAnswer: No! You only pay the Boost commission on a client's FIRST session booking with you. All subsequent bookings from that client are 100% yours with no additional fees.
faq.howToKnow: How do I know which clients came from Boost?
faq.howToKnowAnswer: All clients acquired through Boost are tracked in your "Recent Acquisitions" list above. You can see exactly when they found you, their first booking amount, and the commission charged.
faq.renewEarly: Can I renew before my Boost expires?
faq.renewEarlyAnswer: Yes! You can purchase a new Boost period when your current one is about to expire. The new period will start when your current one ends, giving you continuous visibility.
faq.packagesProducts: Does Boost apply to package purchases or digital products?
faq.packagesProductsAnswer: Boost commission only applies to individual session bookings. If a new client purchases a session package or digital product (e.g., training plans, e-books), no commission is charged. Boost is designed to help you acquire clients through 1-on-1 session bookings.
